title: The Mermaid star
text:
Hellú :P ég var bara að leika mér að gera einhver ljóð og þetta kom út.. nokkuð gott ef ég segi sjálf!
The mermaid star !
One day in sea..
Lil mermaid was born
All the storm gods cried
For this lil hon !
But then she grew up
And becamed a star ..
And then one day in sea
There came up this big war !
The little star got hit,
This bullet camed rigth trough her body .
There was this whole..
It was shaped like a star ..
And the little mermaid.. died in that war !
